profile.bio:
IT engineer, marketer, product leader.  Expert in cloud computing, storage, high availability, disaster recovery. 
Worked at Microsoft, DoubleTake, Epic Solutions, SAIC. 
MBA from Rady School of Business / UCSD, BA OL from Chapman University.
